VIEW_CAT: Use the below buttons to browse other categories
DROP: `Drops` can be used to drop more cards while you are still on a cooldown
GRAB: `Grabs` can be used to grab more cards while you are still on a cooldown
CUBE: `Cubes` are required to transform your cards into their `3D` variants
TP: A `Trade Pass` is required to access mini games and perform multi trades
GUILD_STONE: `Guild Stones` are required to create a `Guild`
BG: `Backgrounds` can be applied to `3D` variants of a character
STAT_RESET: This `Item` can be used to undo stat upgrades of a card
